name: Claudette's

reviews.text: Only wish‚Ä¶bring back the original peanut butter in the G.O.A.T

First time stopping by and I am very pleased. I came at an awkward time (Thursday around 1:30) I will come back at other times to see how busy it gets. There is a wide variety to choose from. I‚Äôm picky with my falafel and hummus and this was very good. Hummus is nice and creamy. Falafel is fresh. Definitely want to try out more of their menu!
My favorite is the cardamom rose latte
Great place great staff
Just so delicious

Food us great and fresh.  Don't go when they open because the workers don't show up to work to serve until 8:20am.  20 minutes after they open!  Not a good way to keep business going in the early morning.

This review is for the Broad Channel location (Arverne is my usual). I was excited when the BC location opened but was disappointed when on more than one occasion I was not greeted with the same Warmth at Rockaway. My last visit though changed my experience for the better, thanks in Huge Part to Rashad. He was personable, pleasant, knowledgeable & has a good sense of humor. The new space is sooo Beautiful & I‚Äôm glad to have an experience that matches the ambiance.
Best soup.
Great quality food and drinks!
Love Claudette's

Stopped off for a sabich on the way to jfk and was super pleased we did! Also got the lemon pepper chicken pita which was super tasty as well. The woman at the counter couldn‚Äôt have been more accommodating, helping us to get our food just how we‚Äôd like it. We were ever so pleasantly surprised by the a√ßa√≠ bowls which have an in house a√ßa√≠- banana blend that is better than any other I‚Äôve tasted. They serve it from a soft serve so it‚Äôs good to go!
Always a pleasure visiting Claudette's healthy food served with a smile.

This is one of the finer places to eat in Howard Beach. I usually wind up eating my food there because the staff is so friendly, helpful and informative. It is a nice experience. Jessica is a sweetheart, can not be more helpful and makes you feel at home. James is the same way he's a solid dude. The food is all high quality.Wild caught salmon, top of the line bell and evans chicken... I highly recommend you go to have a meal or even stop in for one of their amazing coffees or many pastries.They are really that good!

First time visiting Claudette's, I found the Parigyot pita to be delicious and refreshing. I will be definitely recommending and returning to try some other dishes. Ava was the Employee that helped us, she was welcoming and kind. She was super helpful with suggestions and made it a great experience. Thank you!
Bangin vegan options and chill staff
The food is tasty and healthy. I like the schnitzel pita.
Excellent food.
Love this place

Food was really tasty, both the Israeli breakfast plate and Shakshuka were great with the pita. Prices were pretty steep though ($53 including tax and tip for just two dishes and the Shakshuka is a bit smaller) Seems like it‚Äôs more of a to-go spot, the seating inside is high top bar style along the wall.

Claudette's - A Culinary Gem of Israeli-Moroccan Cuisine

For the past two years, Claudette's has been my go-to spot for a delightful culinary experience that perfectly blends Israeli and Moroccan flavors. From the moment you step inside, the warm ambiance and inviting decor create an atmosphere that feels both cozy and vibrant.

One of the standout features of Claudette's is their "Build Your Own Bowl" option, which allows you to craft a meal tailored precisely to your preferences. The variety of options available is impressive, catering to various tastes and dietary needs, making it a perfect choice for anyone looking to explore new flavors or stick to their favorites.

Personally, I can't recommend the schnitzel highly enough. Cooked in coconut oil, , it strikes a perfect balance of crispy on the outside while remaining tender and juicy on the inside. This dish alone is worth a visit, but the chance to customize your bowl with fresh toppings, grains, dips and sauces elevates the experience even further.

Whether you're a fan of Middle Eastern cuisine or simply looking for a delicious meal, Claudette's delivers on all fronts. The combination of high-quality ingredients, creative options, and a welcoming atmosphere makes it a must-visit spot. If you haven't been yet, I highly recommend stopping by for a meal that will leave you craving more!
I‚Äôm a health nut so when I found out about this place I became obsessed. Such a healthy alternative, I get the bowls and they are delicious!!

Me encanta este negocio suelo comer en mi lunch break en Claudette‚Äôs in Arverne  suelo armar mi propio bowl con felafel que normalmente cuesta $15+tax ser√≠a algunos 16 dolares pero qued√© impactada con la subida de los precios en esta nueva sucursal de 16 a 22 dolares plus taxes el mismo bowl que suelo pedir, aparte el baklava costaba 3 dolares y esta a $6. Definitivamente con este aumento de precios no volver√≠a a comer ahi. Espero que puedan ajustar esos precios est√°n demasiado caro.

The interior of the restaurant is absolutely beautiful!! Best coffees in Howard Beach, would definitely recommend any of the special lattes such as the cardamom rose latte, pistachio honey latte, and the halva latte it is absolutely the best! There are so many good options and all of it is delicious. I love to make bowls with the lemon pepper chicken, perfectly grilled and seasoned chicken. The overnight oats are also a great breakfast option. All the pastries are amazing, there‚Äôs not a single pastry that Claudette made that I didn‚Äôt enjoy. The app is also very helpful as it has pictures of every menu item and pre-ordering will always be my go-to. Definitely give Claudette‚Äôs a try if you haven‚Äôt, I could assure you that you won‚Äôt regret it.
Falafel was excellent although a bit pricey but I will buy it again.Prices already jumped up several dollars in a few weeks.prices listed online not accurate.

Love Claudette‚Äôs! I had the wild salmon bowl. It was very fresh and tasty. Salmon was definitely wild caught. The green juice was great too. Nice to have a local spot with healthy delicious choices on the menu. Can‚Äôt wait to try more :)

Very cute spot and the workers are SO kind and welcoming!
I have been saying for the longest that Howard Beach needed a type of healthy spot like this. I appreciate the menu being transparent about where items are sourced from. I got two bowls and two juices. So hearty and filling. Might I add NO seed oils. Omg I hope you guys stay around forever.  Also those little pastries are so good! I‚Äôm coming back ASAP!

Wow, first time ordering from them tonight and it‚Äôs now our go to spot! üòç the pitas and the spicy chicken bowl were delicious. V reasonably priced & the owner was super sweet. Fast service. Overall wonderful experience. Thank you for coming to Crossbay!
Wow!! Absolutely delicious dishes with quality ingredients‚Äîeverything my husband and I got was just so fresh and good. We‚Äôll be coming again especially for all these vegan options üòç
My family and I absolutely love love love this delicious food. Amazing flavours!!!

Can‚Äôt find a better high quality meal
Made with Love anywhere. Great job guys.
Lovely place, delicious food & amazing people! ‚ù§Ô∏è

I went to this restaurant the other day and it was a truly terrible experience.  The menu looked awesome but it was a bad sign from the get go when the server was incredibly rude.  It took a long time for us to get our drinks.  At this point, we were thinking about leaving but we were starving so we stayed.  The food was‚Ä¶ shall we say‚Ä¶ mediocre.  I‚Äôm trying to be kind, as kind as one can be giving a one star review.  Please stay away from this place if you can.

a fellow Moroccan, I love that Claudette's is now in Howard Beach with parking and close to my gym. I get a little bit of back home with the delicious shakshuka and die for a post work out baklava smoothie with protein. Also, the baked goods are perfect for bringing to a bit of moroccan flare to people's homes for desert--the cardamom chocolate loaf and rosewater almond loaf being my current favorites. Alf Mabrok, Mazel Tov and Congratulations on the new location!!!!

AMAZING food and Amazing service!

Had the Haifa bowl and the Israeli breakfast plate and the we absolutely blown away by how fresh it was!! So delicious, will definitely be back for more.
Fantastic coffee delicious healthy food!! Service is top notch. I highly recommend.
Can‚Äôt get enough of this place! Great prices, great food, great service!

The best!! Authentic Israeli Moroccan food!!!
Love it!! Will come back again!!
Great fresh food and really friendly staff. Also, the pistachio honey latte is amazing! Can‚Äôt wait to try all of their other options.

Ordered the wild salmon bowl ($23) and was given farm raised salmon. The salmon was a pale pink color and had a very fishy smell‚Äîopposite of what wild salmon should be. The rest of the bowl was good, the pita was very tasty, but could not eat the salmon. Whoever created the menu should be more transparent about the type of food given.

My review appears to be hidden which is unfortunate but I‚Äôm trying again to see if it‚Äôll work this time.
This place just opened. Went in after the gym to grab a smoothie. The menu looks very healthy so I will definitely be back to try some of their food.

I'll be honest, the restaurant choices in NYC are overwhelming. I'm so happy that we trusted our gut feeling and checked this place out.
Absolutely delicious food, stands a head above the rest. We came on a busy night and still got excellent service. We'll def be back.

I used to stop by this place in rockaway when I was in the area, so happy there‚Äôs one in Howard beach now!! Such a great addition to the area.  Love the delicious healthy options, love that they‚Äôre family oriented, and love that they appreciate teachers!! Welcome to the neighborhood ‚ù§Ô∏è

Amazing place. Incredible food. As a Moroccan myself, I would never have imagined I would appretiate moroccan food outside my mother's house.. but this is the only place that gives my mom's treditional cooking a good match!

Fun and delicious food guaranteed

Wow I‚Äôm impressed. Howard Beach was in need of a some healthy food options and Claudette‚Äôs is great. Their food is fresh and wholesome. On top of that the staff was so kind and friendly. Can‚Äôt wait to try all their food items.
Most amazing food and ambiance! You‚Äôre in for a treat. The Israeli breakfast plate is my go to. Never had a bad meal there.

I recently went to Claudette‚Äôs and let me tell you they have one of the best shakshukas I have ever tried, my husband had the sabich and also loved it! Staff is really nice and service is great, would totally recommend.
So delicious I forgot to take a picture! Food is great, staff is so friendly. So excited to have healthy, flavorful food and non-chain coffee in this area!
One of the workers made me a bowl and everything was delicious friendly staff and food was incredible portion size was great I will definitely be going back
Experience was amazing!! Loved the food!! The service was spectacular!! Cannot wait to go back, was so so so yummy!!

This is a great restaurant! Excellent staff, attentive service. Really worth a trip.
